title: Mystery of Chronic Hand Dermatitis
content: Chronic Hand Dermatitis (CHD) is one of the most persistent and misdiagnosed skin conditions worldwide. The hidden culprit may be fungal infections. Accurate diagnosis is key to healing.

title: Understanding Chronic Hand Dermatitis
content: CHD is a persistent skin condition affecting millions. Types include irritant contact dermatitis, allergic contact dermatitis, atopic hand dermatitis, and hyperkeratotic hand dermatitis.

title: The Overlooked Culprit – Fungal Infections
content: Up to 38% of hand dermatitis cases are actually fungal infections. Misuse of corticosteroids can worsen the problem. Clinical perspective stresses the importance of proper testing.
